segments.text: I think it's time for me to meet my admirer and make him face the music .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You do ? How are you going to contact him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm leaving him a message taped to my computer screen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What does it say ? Do you think he'll see it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He'll see it . It says , I like sweets . Meet me at two thirty in the parking lot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I spy on you guys from the window ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . But I'll fill you in later . Right now I have to find Vince .
segments.speaker: S1
